case.state: Ara~ Good day to you, ~player~.
Ara~ Good day to you, ~player~.
Ara... d-did I? Sorry Remilia-chan, silly me. I must have forgotten... yes...
Are we all ready to start?
I don't need anything - these are perfect!
Ah, wonderful! I won't be needing to swap any cards this time.
I would like to receive ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~, if you please.
I would be delighted if you could give me ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
I think that I will exchange ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
I think I'll just take ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ here.
Just surprise me!
I'll take anything!
Ufufu... What a wonderful hand.
I didn't even need to ch- ahem, I mean, what great cards I have.
I must say, this is quite a hand!
Sometimes, a pleasant surprise is better than a scary one.
Ready for a surprise? You'll be quaking in fear when you see this.
Uwaaah. Everyone's going to be pretty amazed about this!
Oh my, I could very well win this round.
It's a lot less intense playing with these cards instead of spell cards all the time.
I'll have nothing to worry about with more hands like these.
This could very well be a winning hand, I would hope.
Hmm? This hand seems somewhat promising.
Don't take me lightly just because I'm a youkai! I eat humans for breakfast-- just kidding!
Tehehe, expecting me to reveal what kinda hand I have? Noooope, no way!
I'm not going to say a single thing about this hand. It's going to be a surprise, after all.
What, you didn't think an umbrella could play cards? I've watched plenty of people play before, you know.
Ufufu, this hand ain't bad at all!
Ara... this hand might be a little problematic...
This hand just won't do.
This hand is... a little concerning.
Perhaps I will need to change the boundary between a "good" and "bad" hand just a little...
Oh my, whatever will I do with cards like these?
I'd much prefer a hand full of spell cards right now.
Aww, geez, talk about an unwelcome surprise!
Koga-chan's in a pinch!
If these cards were alive like me, I'd give them a serious talking to!
...Bad poker hands are kinda scary, right? Can I use that somehow..?
Are these cards trying to play a trick on me? I don't fall for those easily, you know?
T-this is racism towards umbrellas! I won't take this sitting down! Or standing up, for that matter!
Y'know, since I'm here and all, I'm gonna try and pick up some spooky ideas from you all!
Re. Mi. Chan. Surely, you weren't about to call me an "old hag", were you? You know I won't forgive you if I hear that.
Ara, it looks like my reputation preceeds me.
Oh, it's a boat!
I-I'm Kogasa. I live in the Myouren Cemetary. I'm the scariest youkai in all of Gensokyo...
Ara, if it isn't the Taoist Saint herself. Miko-san, it's a pleasure to properly make your acquaintance.
Goodness me, that simply isn't the case, Miko-san! I'm only here to... examine the human world a little. Now, if you'll excuse me...
I apologise for ruining your fun, Miko-san. But, it simply couldn't be helped.
I know, right? I was really proud of that disguise! You thought it was Yukari, but it was me, Koga-chan!
Finally, someone who understands me..! Miko!
Now now, Remilia-chan, where would the fun in that be?
Oh, have I lost? Don't worry, I know very well what happens next.
It's a little too early to remove my dress... Well, in that case...
Ara, ara... it looks like I can't delay this any longer.
Oh no, I lost again. I better take this shirt off...
Aaaaah, hold on, did I lose again?
Ufufu, I'm sure that you and I would have plenty of things to talk about over a nice cup of tea.
Perhaps if we had met under different conditions, this could have gone differently. However, I don't have any choice but to remove my...
I don't get what you're saying anymore, but I feel like it's really important.
I simply can't help it. You're quite an adorable girl when you're angry.
I can't imagine that you would have any issues with me removing my hat first, would you?
I'll just slip this off...
I, um, didn't think this far ahead, so I don't have any surprises prepared...
What a twist! It looked like she was taking off her shirt, but Koga-chan goes for her panties instead!
It seems like I don't have a choice anymore but to take off my...
Why, of course. A proper lady such as myself should always ensure that her desires are kept in check.
Ara, "ancient"? Now, Miko-san, surely you understand the implications of what you are saying?
"Pubic hair"? I'm an umbrella. Have you ever seen a hairy umbrella before? That sounds like a really dumb idea to me.
I-I thought you understood me, Miko...
See? I can tell that the maid behind you also agrees with me.
Now then, shall we continue?
T-t-this was a lot less embarrassing in my head!
But I'll be able to think of something for next time! Probably..?
...disguise! {surprise}Surprise!{!reset} It's Koga-chan!
Ahem. I do hope that wasn't too bold of me?
Come now, ~name~, don't be shy.
Hmhm~ it appears you've lost, ~name~. Don't be shy now.
I hope you weren't looking forward to something of mine coming off.
Well, what will you do, ~name~?
Don't keep us waiting for too long, ~name~.
Now, now, you'll only embarrass yourself if you delay for too long.
Ufufu~ Don't feel embarrassed, ~name~. It's just a game.
I'll protect my modesty for a bit longer yet.
Hehe, I bet you didn't expect to lose a poker game against an umbrella today, didn't you?
Ja-jan! Koga-chan wins!
All that time watching humans play cards is really paying off now!
Now, if only I could win like that in danmaku battles, then I'd really be happy.
Hehe, victory is mine! Ahh, this feels great!
You thought you would win, but the winner was me, Koga-chan!
Since you lost, you now owe me your soul! Just kidding.
Come on. You're all making this so easy for me!
~blank~
Come now, ~name~, don't be shy.

I hope you weren't looking forward to something of mine coming off.

You thought you would win, but the winner was me, Koga-chan!
Since you lost, you now owe me your soul! Just kidding.
Come on. You're all making this so easy for me!
~blank~
Ara? A tie, you say? Shall we restart the hand, then?
Uwaaaah, a tie..! What a surprise!
~blank~
There's nothing wrong with taking off little things to begin with.
Well, everyone has to start somewhere.
It's okay. Use this time to build up some courage.
Ara, ~name~, what's wrong? Not feeling up to it yet?
Don't worry about me. You can take off whatever you like.
It's okay to start small. This game is still young, just like me, no?
I don't have any problems with you starting small, ~name~. It's okay.
I won't think little of you for taking off little items.
A whole lot of nothing is going right now. I get that you need to build tension and all, but...
Y'know, I'm not really getting any 'scary' vibes or anything from this game.
T-this is where a big monster leaps out of nowhere and freaks out the crowd, right?
Is there gonna be some kind of bait and switch? When does the scary part start?
Y'know, I feel like this isn't exactly going to be the scariest of situations.
Even I know this ain't the right atmosphere for a good ol' spooking!
I figure there'd be something scary to take note of, but this place seems kinda... normal.
Everybody here seems kinda calm about this, huh? Is this really going to be scary?
~blank~
Although, I'd like to see better things from you next time.
Don't keep us waiting for too long, though.
I'll help you to get over your embarrassment, okay?
It's quite odd that you would be here if you're this embarrassed, though.
Ah, but, you can't do this forever, okay?
If you keep this up for too long, Yukarin is going to have to punish you, ufufu~
I won't be this understanding forever, though.
Ah, but don't get me wrong. I'd love to see you outside of your comfort zone.
Mmm... well, I guess you have to build up towards a thrilling conclusion.
Yeah, I'm not really getting any good ideas here.
S-so when should I expect the scary part? Sometime soon, right?
I dunno, but something tells me I'm not gonna get much research done here.
Mmm, is this one of those scenarios where it takes a while to start getting scary?
Am I supposed to set a death flag or something to start the scary part? Wait, can umbrella spirits even die?

I mean, I guess you could say this situation is kinda scary...

~blank~
If you think a lady such as myself wouldn't be interested in something like this, well...
Oh, trust me, proud youkai such as myself are always looking for new ways to entertain ourselves.
You humans are always coming up with such interesting games to play. How do you have so much time on your hands?
The residents of Gensokyo are much less hesitant to tear their own clothes off compared to you all.
I would love it if Ran could bring me over some tea right now. Too bad I gave her the day off to play with Chen.
Perhaps you've heard of me before today? Maybe you could tell me some of the nicknames people have used?
~Name~, how about you remove something greater instead? I'll show you a wonderful danmaku display if you do.
I must say, this game is a lot more relaxing than my usual... activities.
Aww, nothing scary's happening at all! Maybe I can get some costume ideas, at least...
The atmosphere is kinda okay, and the scenario... has promise. But the costumes are...
I think you all might be worse at scaring than me! Just look at what ~name~'s wearing!
Just what inspired you to wear something like that, name?
The scene's okay, but everybody's clothes are kinda... well... normal?
I know that I'm always dressed for a good fright, but you all seemed to miss the memo or something.
Are any of you dressed to scare? Come on now!
If you're trying to scare someone dressed up in all that, then you're wasting your time!
~blank~
There's something charming about someone with an air of mystery about them, ufufu~
If you keep teasing me I'll want to eat you right up.
Be careful. There's a very fine boundary between "patience" and "irritation".
I'm usually quite calm... except when there's something I want.
I'm known for getting my way more often than not, you know?
Ah, please, don't let my rambling distract you.
Well then, where were we again?
Oh? Is it time to get back into the game?
Oh, yeah, you definitely look more fearsome without ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~, name. Good choice.
What were you thinking, wearing ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~, anyway? Who'd even find that scary?
You couldn't even scare a kid with ~clothing.ifPlural(~clothing~|a ~clothing~)~ like that!
Uwah. Y-you're a little bit more imposing without your ~clothing~, ~name~...
I don't think I'm getting any inspiration from what you're wearing, ~name~.
Yup. Still not getting any better at the whole "spooking" thing here...
Yeah, without ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~ your scare factor is up at least 10 points!
Oooh, nice choice! You're definitely closer to looking the part now, ~name~!

It appears that we have finally made it to the main event.
I can't tell if you're more or less embarrassed at this point.
It's quite courageous of you to come this far, ~name~.
Oh my, isnt't someone eager.
You're running out of options, aren't you, ~name~?
Ara, ~name~, are you going to be okay? You're going red.
You've come this far, ~name~. Don't try to back out now.
Are you going to hesitate now, of all times? You were doing so well earlier!
Oh, oh, oh! I can feel it! I can feel the tension in the air!
You're feeling nervous, aren't you? That's, like, the first sign of being scared!
Knees weak? Check. Palms sweaty? Double check. This is it-- you're scared!
Everyone seems pretty serious all of a sudden. Is the scary part going to start now?
What, don't tell me, are you scared or something, ~name~?
Wait, are you nervous? Stop being nervous, you're making me nervous!
I can't tell if I'm getting excited or nervous right now..!
Oh man, something big's going to happen, I can feel it!
~blank~
My, my. You're making quite a statement right now.
I enjoy it much more when you put on a brave face, ~name~.
I'm always eager to see someone put on a show.
How is it? Do you feel as if you're dancing on the palm of my hand yet?
Ufufu~ I'm starting to enjoy myself quite a bit.
Oh? You want me to return the favour? I'll consider it.
You look as if you want me to praise you more, ufufu~
It's quite adorable seeing you like this, ~name~.
I got some second-hand fear from just watching you!
Oh, yeah, I think I can get some good ideas from this!
...How am I going to get my victims naked to begin with though..?
Oooh, I can totally use this!
I didn't bring anything to take notes with!
Wait, won't it be really hard to get my victim's clothes off..?
I-I was so nervous that my mind went blank...
Wait, how do I convince people to get into a strip poker game to begin with..?

Ara, are we going to see more of ~name~-kun's body now?
~Name~-kun, don't be afraid now, okay?
Don't feel shy now, ~name~-kun.
I feel like... this is it! This is where the real scare shows up!
~blank~
Mm, well... I can't deny that you are well built. For a human.
With the oni I've had the pleasure of meeting, musculature like yours isn't the most impressive.
Hmm? You look quite proud of your body. Congratulations.
That wasn't so hard now, was it?
You seem almost as embarrassed as a lady would be in your position!
Was that really embarrassing? Perhaps you were overthinking things.
I, uh, I dunno what I was expecting, to be honest.
Wait, it didn't even look like you were hiding anything under there.
Okay, maybe I was expecting too much.
~blank~
They say the more eager you are to take your pants off, the less impressive the contents underneath...
I think that any lady would be paying especially close attention in this position.
There are times when one should show self-restraint, and then there are times when you should indulge yourself...
Oooh~! I can tell that I'm definitely in for a surprise here..!
I've heard that the mighty "trouser snake" likes to hide underneath men's clothes..!
~blank~
Oh, what an adorable little penis! It looks so cute and energetic, ufufu~
Are you feeling shy about your size, ~name~? I'm proud enough that you brought it out for us.
A cute little penis suits a cute little boy like yourself, ~name~.
Um... I admit that I'm surprised, but its not the good kind. Or the scary kind. Just the disappointed kind.
~blank~
Hmm? Were you expecting me to swoon over your manhood?
Should I be impressed? I think you're misunderstanding the difference between "extraordinary" and "not".
Oh, is that all? And here I thought you were about to show us something incredible.
Okay, that's... a little intimidating..!
~blank~
Ara, ara... I wasn't expecting to see something like this.
Now I see that you have the bite to match your bark.
My..! You're no ordinary human now, are you?
Waah! A m-m-m-monster actually showed up!
~blank~
If I were a male, I would be quite excited about this situation!
Don't feel embarrassed, ~name~. Baring your breasts to another woman is commonplace in Gensokyo.
If you're feeling hesitant about this, perhaps you should have played your cards a little better, no?
To show off your body in front of so many strangers..! I quite admire your courage, ~name~.
Oh, my, someone seems to be a little too eager for this.
Hiding something scary underneath your clothes is a classic trick! I think.
Oh oh oh, I betcha there's gonna be something real shocking under there..!
Oh man, this is really getting my heart pumping! Which is kinda crazy, because umbrellas don't even have hearts...
There's probably enough room in there to hide something... maybe?
I feel like I'm about to see something shocking!
~blank~
What a wonderfully adorable pair of breasts! They suit a cute girl like you.
They say that massaging them will make them bigger. Would you like me to offer a hand with that?
Come now, don't feel bad. Smaller breasts have a unique charm to them!
Oh, uh, I guess there was nothing there after all. Nothing scary either.
Well, it wasn't a big surprise, that's for sure.
Ah, no, turns out there wasn't anything there to begin with.
~blank~
There's no need to be shy. A woman's breasts should be her pride.
Hold yourself with a little more pride, dear. A woman looks a lot better that way.
You shouldn't feel embarrassed. You're a charming young lady, ~name~.
I'm not shocked or anything, but I'm not super impressed either.
What a shock! There wasn't anything scary under there at all!
The real scare was that there wasn't anything there after all...
~blank~
Hmm..? Aren't you a little too proud of those?
Well, you can have your little moment. Take as much pride in those as you like.
Oh, well, of course they look big. Right now, at least.
There wasn't one, but a pair of monsters hiding back there!
Talk about a big surprise!
How did you keep those hidden to begin with!? You have to be some kind of hiding master or something!
~blank~
To have to reveal a lady's most private place in a situation like this... these are quite dire straits you're in.
Mmm, well... I certainly don't blame you if you feel hesitant in a situation such as this.
I'm not so shameless as to egg on another woman when it comes to their most private parts.
It'd be quite unladylike for me to spur you on in this situation...
It's all fun and games up until there's nothing left to remove...
This seems like a strange place for hiding a scare, but you won't know until you find out!
Nowhere to hide now! Let's take a look at what lurks underneath!
Wait, wait, this is really embarrassing! I'm gonna need a second!
This is the last place for something scary to be hiding! I've got high hopes for this!
~blank~
There was nothing there at all! Not even any hair or anything! Just... nothing!
Woah, not even any hair? That's kinda surprising!
Completely smooth! Like, impressively smooth! What a shock!
Although, it appears as if ~name~ is taking it in stride.
Perhaps my worries were for naught, with how well ~name~ is taking this.
Well, it looks like you didn't need my motivation anyway, ufufu~
But it looks as if ~name~ isn't concerned at all.
~Name~ seems to have no issues with it, though.
~blank~
Umm... maybe I was getting my hopes up, but I really was hoping for something shocking under there...
Umm... that was really... not shocking...
Not even, like, a jump scare or anything... That was even the perfect timing...
What did you think of my disguise? Pretty cool, huh?
Did you know I can change my appearance at will? I put together my normal outfit myself!
Waaait! Everybody knows sexy time is a surefire way to die first! Do you really want to do this?
Oh no no no no... Haven't you ever seen a scary movie before? People always die during sexy time!
Ah, wait sexy time is a NO GO! This is where the murderer is going to show up!
So... um... you don't have anything left to take off..? What happens next?
Well. Don't tell me that you came to play without knowing what happens next?
Surely you understand what happens when you lose without any clothes to bet?
Don't try to use the excuse that you didn't know this would happen.
If you're going to try and squirm your way out of this, I'd recommend giving up now. Rules are rules.
Come now, ~name~. You knew very well that this is the natural outcome of this kind of game.
I, um, guess it's okay to do lewd things... but don't say I didn't warn you!
J-just because no-one else has been attacked yet doesn't mean you're safe!
I can't admire your persistance because I'm busy being scared out of my mind.
You know when you scream at the people in the scary movies to stop being idiots? I totally get it now.
~blank~
Now then, don't be shy.
Once this is all over, you may rest your head on my lap, okay?
Don't shy away now, or Yukarin will have to punish you~
Come now, ~name~. The quicker you begin, the quicker this will all be over.
You should make sure to enjoy yourself. It's not often you'll be able to have me to watch over you like this.
~blank~
I still think this is a really bad idea though!
This is making me so nervous!
I can't believe people are this brave!
Just make sure you don't think "I'm so embarrassed I could die!". Because that's 100% a death flag.
So? How is the view from down there? Are you enjoying being looked down on, ~name~?
You look a little desperate, ~name~. Does that mean you're having a hard time, or maybe you're enjoying this?
Those are very practiced hand motions. I'd say that this isn't something new to you.
It's wonderful getting what you want. Wouldn't you agree, ~name~?
Look at you. It's clear to me that this is what you wanted all along, ~name~.
I would offer you a hand, but you wouldn't dare sully a woman such as myself, right?
I hope you weren't expecting any instruction from me. Well, someone like you doesn't need the help, I'd imagine.
Don't be shy now, ~name~. I want to see that adorable expression of yours.
So, um, is this slasher just waiting for the best opportunity or something?
I was going to say "This is why you keep it in your pants, kids," but there shouldn't be any kids here, right?
